title: Lame AF Presidency, GOP vs God 11.10.20
itunes:title: Lame AF Presidency, GOP vs God 11.10.20
description:
In episode 756, Jack and Miles are joined by our writer and Rewatchability podcast host JM McNab to discuss the new Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine, Mark Esper being fired, how the transition of presidential power is going so far, some Michelle Bachmann nonsense, the latest voting conspiracy, the McCloskey's suing everyone, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pence breaks silence to take credit for Pfizer vaccine - and drugs company immediately denies Trump involved
  2. Hopes rise for end of pandemic as Pfizer says vaccine is 90% effective
  3. How Effective is the Flu Vaccine?
  4. Fox & Friends host on promising vaccine news: "Are you finding the timing curious? We had an election a week ago"
  5. Defense Secretary Mark Esper ‘Has Been Terminated,’ Trump Says In Tweet
  6. GSA official in charge of handing transition resources to Biden isn't budging
  7. Former congresswoman Michele Bachmann calls on God to "smash the delusion, Father, that Joe Biden is our president. He is not."
  8. Infamous ‘Hoax’ Artist Behind Trumpworld’s New Voter Fraud Claim
  9. Hiding Details of Dubious Deal, U.S. Invokes National Security
  10. 'The Man Who Conned The Pentagon'
  11. Emails show Arpaio paid informant at least $120,000 for 'bogus data'
  12. Conspiracy theory tries to connect Joe Arpaio, the Obama birth certificate and Trump's wiretap claims
  13. McCloskeys sue UPI, photographer over iconic image confronting protesters
  14. WATCH: Frontline - Pa Salieu (Yussef Dayes Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
